text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Valorant, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Lenovo IdeaPad 330 81FL0066US 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 12 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 16 GB Optane Memory Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The fan noise is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Valorant, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Lenovo IdeaPad 330 81FL0066US 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 12 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 16 GB Optane Memory Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The speakers is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Lenovo IdeaPad 330 81FL0066US 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 12 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 16 GB Optane Memory Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Starfield, and the performance throttles significantly. The keyboard has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Lenovo IdeaPad 330 81FL0066US 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 12 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 16 GB Optane Memory Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Call of Duty: Warzone, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Lenovo IdeaPad 330 81FL0066US 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 12 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 16 GB Optane Memory Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The build material is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.
